data.current_description: Get the complete list of countries supported in the number generation API.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete list of countries where lottery number generation is supported. Returns an array of country identifiers and names that can be used with other lottery operations. No authentication required.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about return format and whether authentication is needed. Added specific details about return value structure and authentication requirements to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get_/lottery/supported' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary and redundant wording in description ('supported' repeated). Missing details about required parameter format, return structure, and relationship to other endpoints. Enhanced to clarify parameter requirements, return format, and use case context for AI agents.

data.current_description: Get the list of supported lottery games supported in the given country.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all lottery games available in a specified country. Requires a country parameter (country code or identifier from /lottery/countries endpoint). Returns an array of lottery game objects with game names, identifiers, and number generation rules. Use this to determine which lottery games are available before generating numbers.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and redundant wording in description ('supported' repeated). Missing details about required parameter format, return structure, and relationship to other endpoints. Enhanced to clarify parameter requirements, return format, and use case context for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/lottery/draw' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague about parameters and return format. Lacks context about what constitutes a 'draw' and how parameters relate to previous endpoints. Added specific parameter names, return value details, and clarification that each call is independent to improve AI agent decision-making about when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Generate random draw for a given lottery game.
data.description_suggestion: Generates random lottery numbers for a specified lottery game. Requires two parameters: country (country code) and game (lottery game identifier). Returns an array of randomly generated numbers conforming to the specified lottery game's rules and number ranges. Each call produces a new independent random draw.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague about parameters and return format. Lacks context about what constitutes a 'draw' and how parameters relate to previous endpoints. Added specific parameter names, return value details, and clarification that each call is independent to improve AI agent decision-making about when and how to use this operation.
